targets.expr: min(container_spec_cpu_quota{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"query-frontend|loki", pod=~"loki-(query-frontend|read).*"} / container_spec_cpu_period{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"query-frontend|loki", pod=~"loki-(query-frontend|read).*"})

min(container_spec_cpu_quota{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"query-scheduler|loki", pod=~"loki-(query-scheduler|read).*"} / container_spec_cpu_period{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"query-scheduler|loki", pod=~"loki-(query-scheduler|read).*"})

min(container_spec_cpu_quota{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"querier|loki", pod=~"loki-(querier|read).*"} / container_spec_cpu_period{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"querier|loki", pod=~"loki-(querier|read).*"})

min(container_spec_cpu_quota{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"bloom-gateway|loki", pod=~"loki-(query-frontend|read).*"} / container_spec_cpu_period{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"bloom-gateway|loki", pod=~"loki-(query-frontend|read).*"})

sum by(instance, pod, device) (rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) + ignoring(pod) group_right() (label_replace(count by(instance, pod, device) (container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"bloom-gateway|loki", pod=~"loki-(query-frontend|read).*", device!~".*sda.*"}), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)") * 0)

sum by(instance, pod, device) (rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) + ignoring(pod) group_right() (label_replace(count by(instance, pod, device) (container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"bloom-gateway|loki", pod=~"loki-(query-frontend|read).*", device!~".*sda.*"}), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)") * 0)

max by(persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} / kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) and count by(persistentvolumeclaim) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_labels{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",label_name=~"bloom-gateway.*"})

min(container_spec_cpu_quota{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"loki|ingester", pod=~"loki-(ingester|write).*"} / container_spec_cpu_period{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"loki|ingester", pod=~"loki-(ingester|write).*"})

min(container_spec_cpu_quota{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"ruler|loki", pod=~"loki-(ruler|backend).*"} / container_spec_cpu_period{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"ruler|loki", pod=~"loki-(ruler|backend).*"})
